inputs.task: Review and improve homepage copy for LaunchBase
inputs.description: AI-powered website operations system that handles website updates, social media, and business intelligence for small businesses. Core value: responsibility transfer (hand off operations, keep visibility). Not a website builder - a complete operations handoff with observability, reversibility, and safety gating.

currentCopy.hero: Stop carrying the system in your head. Hand it off. Keep visibility.
currentCopy.problem: No one owns the system. You're the fallback for everything.
currentCopy.solution: LaunchBase becomes the owner. You stay informed, not involved.
currentCopy.trust: Safe by default. Fully logged. Reversible.

inputs.audience: Small business owners (fitness studios, coffee shops, consulting firms, e-commerce) who are tired of being the bottleneck for their website and marketing operations
inputs.tone: Direct, honest, reassuring. B2B professional. Emphasize responsibility transfer and observability.
inputs.constraints: No hype language. No unverifiable claims. Focus on concrete benefits: mental load reduction, visibility, reversibility, safety gating.

proposedChanges.value: Stop juggling operations in your head. Hand them off.
proposedChanges.rationale: Clarifies the action and maintains the focus on responsibility transfer.

proposedChanges.value: Maintain visibility while LaunchBase manages your website operations.
proposedChanges.rationale: Emphasizes the value of visibility alongside operational management.

proposedChanges.value: No one takes ownership of your operations.
proposedChanges.rationale: More direct phrasing that emphasizes the issue of ownership clearly.

proposedChanges.value: You're constantly relied upon, making you the bottleneck for everything.
proposedChanges.rationale: Enhances clarity and urgency about the current problem faced by the target audience.

proposedChanges.value: LaunchBase takes ownership, allowing you to stay informed without the daily grind.
proposedChanges.rationale: Clarifies the benefit of staying informed while reducing operational involvement.

proposedChanges.value: Inherently safe. Completely logged. Always reversible.
proposedChanges.rationale: Improves clarity by using more straightforward language while maintaining the original meaning.

issues.description: Claims 'AI-powered website operations system' without clear evidence or definition in input.
issues.rationale: Unverified claim - introduces AI capability not present in input

issues.description: Phrases 'fully logged' and 'safe by default' are vague and not defined in input.
issues.rationale: Ambiguity - terms are not concrete or specific

suggestedFixes.fix: Website operations system that handles updates, social media, and business intelligence for small businesses.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Removes unverified AI claim, focuses on functionalities stated in input

suggestedFixes.fix: Operations are managed with visibility and the ability to revert changes.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clarifies terms to improve specificity and understanding

risks: Changes may alter the perceived technological sophistication of the product
assumptions: Business owners understand the importance of system ownership
